children.innerText: , bhikkhave, sikkhādubbalyāni. Katamani Panca? Pāṇātipāto…pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca sikkhādubbalyāni.

innerText: 83 . ''Pancimani, bhikkhave, sikkhādubbalyāni. Katamani Panca? Pāṇātipāto…pe… surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ – imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañca sikkhādubbalyāni.

children.innerText: ''Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā. Katame cattaro? Idha

, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi… cittasamādhi… vīmaṃsāsāmādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā''ti. Paṭhamaṃ.

innerText: ''Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya cattāro iddhipādā bhāvetabbā. Katame cattaro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi… cittasamādhi… vīmaṃsāsāmādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ sikkhādubbalyānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā''ti. Paṭhamaṃ.

children.innerText: , bhikkhave, cetasovinibandhā. Katame Panca? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti…pe… ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca cetasovinibandhā.

innerText: 92 . ''Pancime, bhikkhave, cetasovinibandhā. Katame Panca? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāmesu avītarāgo hoti…pe… ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca cetasovinibandhā.

children.innerText: ''Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ cetasovinibandhānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā. Katame cattaro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi… cittasamādhi… vīmaṃsāsāmādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ
bhaveti. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ cetasovinibandhānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā''ti. Dasamaṃ.

innerText: ''Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ cetasovinibandhānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā. Katame cattaro? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhi… cittasamādhi… vīmaṃsāsāmādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃbhaveti. Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ cetasovinibandhānaṃ pahānāya ime cattāro iddhipāda bhāvetabbā''ti. Dasamaṃ.
